au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.internal

Class AttributeMacroSubstituter

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.internal.AttributeMacroSubstituter

  • public class AttributeMacroSubstituter
extends java.lang.Object
    Macro substituter for rig client information discovery (getAttribute call).

    Substitutes macro variables into a string. All variables must be prefixed with '--' and end in '--'. The following is the list of macro variable name and macro value pairs.

    • __HOSTNAME__ -
    • __IP__ -
    The algorithm for determining the values is: 1. If the property 'Rig_Client_IP_Address' is set, the __IP__ value is the configured value, and the __HOSTNAME__ value is determined from that IP. 2. If the 'Listening_Network_Interface' property is set, the __IP__ and __HOSTNAME__ values are determined from the configured network interface name. 3. If neither are set, the __IP__ and __HOSTNAME__ are determined from the first iterated network interface (eth0 on Linux systems).

      • findNetworkMacroValue

        private java.lang.String findNetworkMacroValue(boolean returnHostname)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Finds and returns either the host name or IP of a network interface. The network interface used is either:
        1. The network interface with the configured IP address, if the IP address is set.
        2. The network interface with the configured device name, if the device name is configured and the IP address is not configured.
        3. The first iterated non-loopback network interface if neither the network interface IP address or network device name is configured.
        Parameters:
        returnHostname - true if the host name is to be returned, \ otherwise the IP address is returned
        Returns:
        host name or IP network host name or IP
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - error finding network information or no viable \ network interface
